name: Orb of Corrosion
description: Seepage from the wounds of a warrior deity, sealed in an arcanist's orb following a campaign of vicious slaughter.

abilities.name: Corrosion
abilities.description: The wielder's attacks apply armor reduction and movement speed slow on enemy units.
notes: The corrosive attacks also reduce the effectiveness of health restoration on the targets
The slow is more effective against ranged enemies
Does not pierce Debuff Immunity sources
This ability is not bestowed by Illusions
The bonus armor reduction value does not stack
Reapplying the debuff refreshes the duration
Does not work against ward-type units and couriers
Weaker sources do not reduce armor if a stronger source is present, except for Desolator and Stygian Desolator, which stack with each other
Weaker sources do not slow or reduce health restoration if a stronger source is present

additionalInfo: The ability effects are applied as follows: 1. The modifier_blight_stone_buff, 2. The wielder's attack instance
